description: Website for the NeevCode Community, a space for students to collaborate, learn, and grow through challenges and events.

title: ACM Student Chapter Website
description: Website for the ACM Student Chapter at Jain (Deemed-to-be) University, featuring events, workshops, and student resources.

title: ForensicInstaller
description: ForensicInstaller is a simple Bash script designed to automate the installation of essential digital forensics tools for Kali Linux.

title: Landing Page & Dashboard to track dropshipping Products
YouTube Playlist Downloader
description: This is a simple web application built with Python and Flask for downloading YouTube playlists.

title: TechnoFusion 2k24 - Official Registration Page
description: This project was developed to manage participant registrations for TechnoFusion 2k24, an intercollegiate fest organized by ACM Student Chapter Jain (Deemed-to-be University).

title: AI-based Attendance Tracker
description: This project is designed to track attendance using AI and facial recognition. It can also monitor student behavior during class, detecting if students are distracted or not paying attention.
